meanings.definition: The quality or state of being delayed or tardy.
meanings.sent1: Her belatedness in submitting the assignment caused her to lose points.
meanings.sent2: The belatedness of the train made everyone late for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: His belatedness in realizing the mistake was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The belatedness of the apology only added to the hurt feelings.
meanings.sent5: The belatedness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: The fact of being late or delayed.
meanings.sent1: The belatedness of the package delivery frustrated the customer.
meanings.sent2: We apologized for the belatedness of our response to the inquiry.
meanings.sent3: The belatedness of the bus made everyone laugh at the situation.
meanings.sent4: The belatedness of the news shocked everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The belatedness of the snowfall turned the town into a winter wonderland.
